channel.title: Changing logged in text color. How?
channel.description:
Well, title was a lil bad but nyway:
[img]http://www.finpker.arkku.net/problem.bmp[/img] How to change that text color? For blue, purple, or.. idk

item.title: Changing logged in text color. How?
item.dc:creator: @X_Fin_pker_X X Fin pker X
item.description:
@X_Fin_pker_X wrote:

Not working.

client.java:848: illegal start of expression
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = @blue@playerName+" has logged out.@
blue@";
                                             ^
1 error
